data: Having little knowledge of rhetorical art, and possessing but a limited imagination, it is only a strong sense of the duty I owe to Science and the progressive minds of the age, that induces me to come before the public in the character of an author.

Mizora: A Prophecy
A MSS. Found Among the Private Papers of the Princess Vera Zarovitch
